Havotron looked at Autofire.  "You shall feel the pain of my 
greatness you moronic, blind to power, little piece of scrap metal." 
Havotron said as he pointed his energy cannon at Autofire.  "No, 
you will get Megatron this instant." He said, also giving a 
command. "Contructicons, Combine now"

Scrapper looked to the rest.  He for one did not want to fight other 
Decepticons.  "Do we??" he whispered to Hook.
